cards.name: Edric Storm
cards.text: Stealth. Each player cannot gain more than 3 power each round (among all cards they control).
cards.flavor: “And may the Father judge you justly, Lord Davos.”

cards.name: A New Hand
cards.text: Reaction: After a Small Council character you control leaves play, search your deck for a different Small Council character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Max 1 per phase.)
cards.flavor: “Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the King”- Robert Baratheon

cards.name: Orkmont Elite
cards.text: Assault. Pillage. While Orkmont Elite has an attachment, it gains renown. Reaction: After Orkmont Elite discards a card using pillage, put an attachment from the losing opponent's discard pile into play under your control, attached to a character you control.

cards.name: Reaver's Greataxe
cards.text: Non-unique [greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains the Raider trait. During the first challenge you initiate each phase, attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent who controls fewer attachments than you.

cards.name: Gyles Rosby
cards.text:
If you have no gold in your gold pool during the challenges phase, kill Gyles Rosby.
+2 Income.
cards.flavor: “No doubt he will cough the whole lot of us into our graves.” -  Cersei Lannister

cards.name: King's Landing Dromond
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reduce the number of unspent gold you return to the treasury during the taxation phase by 1. Reaction: After King's Landing Dromond comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Southron Informant
cards.text: Ambush (1). Forced Reaction: After Southron Informant enters play during the challenges phase, give control of it to an opponent. Then, discard 1 card at random from that player's hand and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dornish Sloop
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After Dornish Sloop comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Dirk
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After a character is discarded from play, place it in its owner's dead pile.
cards.flavor: “There are no laws beyond the Wall, old man. Remember?”

cards.name: Conspirator's Blade
cards.text: Shadow (1). While attached character is participating in a challenge, the effects of events you play cannot be canceled. Reaction: After Conspirator's Blade comes out of shadows, reduce the cost of the next card you bring out of shadows this phase by 2.

cards.name: Tytos Blackwood
cards.text: Renown. While Tytos Blackwood is participating in a challenge, treat each other character without power as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Above the Rest
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control gains exactly 1 power, have it gain 1 power. Then, if that character has the House Tully trait, stand it. (Max 1 per phase.)
cards.flavor: Lord Jason Mallister had brought his power out from Seagard to join them as they swept around the headwaters of the Blue Fork.

cards.name: Ser Harry Strickland
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (3). Reaction: After Ser Harry Strickland enters play, choose and stand a Mercenary character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.
cards.flavor: Homeless Harry looked little like a warrior.

cards.name: Qartheen Galleas
cards.text: Shadow (1). You are considered to have 1 fewer card in your hand. Reaction: After Qartheen Galleas comes out of shadows, choose a card with shadow in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

cards.name: Megga Tyrell
cards.text: Reaction: After 1 or more characters are removed from a challenge, gain 1 power for your faction. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: “Someday I want some champion to wear my favor, and kill a hundred men.”

cards.name: Redwyne Merchanter
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Redwyne Merchanter comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. +1 Income

cards.name: The Bastard of Driftmark
cards.text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After a Warship location enters play under your control, stand The Bastard of Driftmark. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: “I am told that removing the head from the body is often mortal.”

cards.name: Ibbenese Whaler
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reduce the cost to marshal your first card into shadows each round by 1. Taxation Action: If you have no cards in your hand, kneel and return Ibbenese Whaler to shadows to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: The War of the Five Kings
cards.text: Raise the claim value on The War of the Five Kings by 1 for each rival you have.

cards.name: Trading With Braavos
cards.text: Your deck may include non-loyal Warship locations from any faction. Your deck cannot include more than 1 copy of each non-limited location. Reaction: After claim is applied for a challenge you won, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a non-limited location, reveal it, and add it to your hand (you may place it in shadows instead if it has the Warship trait). Shuffle your deck.
